dmca.title: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2885250O] Abuse
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern: Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"). Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim. Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/index.html?p=copyright. Legal Response Team THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC. -----Original Message----- From: abuse@ev1servers.net [mailto:abuse@ev1servers.net] Sent: Saturday, February 03, 2007 10:48 PM To: DMCA Subject: [ThePlanetAbuse-C2885250O] Abuse ==== Forwarded Ticket ==== 1. Abuse Added by system at Friday, Feb 2 2007 05:03 pm X-MailFrom: dinhazinhamachado@bol.com.br X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net Received: from [216.12.192.67] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for ; Fri Feb 2 17:03:01 2007 Received: (qmail 11590 invoked by alias); 2 Feb 2007 23:03:01 -0000 Delivered-To: abuse@inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net Received: (qmail 11587 invoked from network); 2 Feb 2007 23:03:01 -0000 Received: from smtp02.theplanet.com (70.87.6.111) by inbound.abacus.ev1servers.net with SMTP; 2 Feb 2007 23:03:01 -0000 Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830); Fri, 2 Feb 2007 17:03:01 -0600 Return-path: Delivery-date: Fri, 02 Feb 2007 17:03:01 -0600 Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181] helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com) by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from dinhazinhamachado@bol.com.br) with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256) (Exim) id 1HD7Qr-0003q1-5g for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 02 Feb 2007 17:03:01 -0600 Received: from relay2.bol.com.br ([200.221.4.106]) by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from dinhazinhamachado@bol.com.br) with esmtp (Exim) id 1HD7Qp-000JcC-Cw for abuse@theplanet.com; Fri, 02 Feb 2007 17:02:59 -0600 Received: from localhost (localhost [127.0.0.1]) by salsa2.bol.com.br (Postfix) with ESMTP id D4318E005CD7 for ; Fri, 2 Feb 2007 21:02:55 -0200 (BRST) Received: from bol.com.br (wharton9.mail.sys.intranet [172.26.5.114]) by salsa2.bol.com.br (Postfix) with ESMTP id 2BCC3E005ACF for ; Fri, 2 Feb 2007 21:02:54 -0200 (BRST) Date: Fri, 2 Feb 2007 21:02:54 -0200 Message-Id: Subject: Abuse MIME-Version: 1.0 X-Sensitivity: 3 Content-Type: multipart/alternative; boundary="_=__=_XaM3_.1170457374.2A.895662.42.11590.52.42.007.1514461462 " From: dinhazinhamachado@bol.com.br To: "abuse" X-XaM3-API-Version: 4.3(R1) (B5) X-SenderIP: 201.3.188.132 X-SIG5: b48c698f3da819fe2a671ff2bb88a68f Received-SPF: pass (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: domain of bol.com.br designates 200.221.4.106 as permitted sender) client-ip=200.221.4.106; envelope-from=dinhazinhamachado@bol.com.br; helo=relay2.bol.com.br; X-OriginalArrivalTime: 02 Feb 2007 23:03:01.0437 (UTC) FILETIME=[49B26ED0:01C7471E] (multipart/alternative) MIME element (text/plain) Good night I am here for making one denounces of a site that is housed by host http://hostphd.com.br and that it is installed in its datacenter. The site is this http://hyperdown.org/ this site contains material of piracy as well as films, games, series all thus counterfeited products thus infringing a mount of laws of copyright Thanks and sorry for my english. Fernanda Machado MIME element (text/html)
Good night I am here for making one denounces of a site that is housed by host http://hostphd.com.br and that it is installed in its datacenter. The site is this http://hyperdown.org/ this site contains material of piracy as well as films, games, series all thus counterfeited products thus infringing a mount of laws of copyright

Fernanda Machado
